video.title: La Niña
video.synopsis: A former Colombian guerrilla fighter faces challenges as she reintegrates into society and tries to overcome her traumatic memories.

episodes.synopsis: After she's caught committing a crime, Sara, once known as Belky, joins a social reintegration program that reconnects her with her past life.
episodes.title: Episode 1

episodes.synopsis: Sara is excited to study medicine, but painful memories continue to haunt her. Manuel opens up to Sara, and they share a special moment together.
episodes.title: Episode 2

episodes.synopsis: Sara's life is threatened multiple times and she's forced to relocate, seeking safety with her family. Her sisters resent the new life they must lead.
episodes.title: Episode 3

episodes.synopsis: Sara returns to being called her birth name, Belky. She takes an important university exam but is rattled by a fellow student's familial connection.
episodes.title: Episode 4

episodes.synopsis: Belky lies about her past during her university interview. Meanwhile, Manuel comes to Bogotá in the hopes of rekindling their relationship.
episodes.title: Episode 5

episodes.synopsis: Belky works on ways to finance her education. In the process, she clashes with her mother over the importance of medical school.
episodes.title: Episode 6

episodes.synopsis: Belky shocks her classmates with how much she knows about guerrillas. Manuel's godfather helps find him a job at the university.
episodes.title: Episode 7

episodes.synopsis: Belky discovers that Manuel is working at her school and lies to her friends about who he is. Col. Barragán's wife offers to help him find Belky.
episodes.title: Episode 8

episodes.synopsis: Belky has a disturbing run-in with Col. Barragán. Tatiana learns that Belky and others from her program are being followed and photographed.
episodes.title: Episode 9

episodes.synopsis: Barragán bullies Belky with the knowledge he has about her past. She responds by threatening to put his daughter in danger as tensions rise.
episodes.title: Episode 10

episodes.synopsis: Manuel comes clean about the part he unwittingly played in Barragán's discovery of Belky. Barragán continues his investigation with Barón's help.
episodes.title: Episode 11

episodes.synopsis: Yolima visits Manuel with some surprising news. Tatiana and Col. Alzate meet with Belky to talk about Col. Barragán.
episodes.title: Episode 12

episodes.synopsis: Col. Alzate urges Belky to find witnesses to help formally create a case against Col. Barragán. Belky struggles to balance school and work.
episodes.title: Episode 13

episodes.synopsis: Manuel finds out that Belky didn't receive the card he wrote to her. Santiago continues to pursue Belky romantically. Barragán meets with Marimar.
episodes.title: Episode 14

episodes.synopsis: Manuel cozies up to Julio and Esteban in the hopes of finding out where Raúl is living. Victor flirts with Juliana at a party with the other students.
episodes.title: Episode 15

episodes.synopsis: Manuel tries to convince Raúl to turn against Barragán. Connie is caught in a difficult situation with Rodrigo when he suffers an allergy attack.
episodes.title: Episode 16

episodes.synopsis: Manuel asks Yolima to leave his house. Belky finally confronts Raúl about failing to help her while she was being sexually assaulted.
episodes.title: Episode 17

episodes.synopsis: Belky puts her future at the university in jeopardy when she lashes out at Natalia. Raúl speaks out about Barragán's military transgressions.
episodes.title: Episode 18

episodes.synopsis: Belky begins therapy. Someone close to Manuel gets hurt. Victor threatens to reveal Natalia's secret if she brings charges against Belky.
episodes.title: Episode 19

episodes.synopsis: Professor Amino and Horacio weigh in on Belky's fate at the university. Santiago learns the truth about Manuel and Belky's relationship.
episodes.title: Episode 20

episodes.synopsis: Belky confronts Santiago about his bet. Alfonso tells Horacio he's worried about his marriage. Barón speaks with Raúl about his testimony.
episodes.title: Episode 21

episodes.synopsis: Alfonso attempts to save his marriage. An attack on Raúl leaves someone else injured. Barragán realizes Barón hid information from him.
episodes.title: Episode 22

episodes.synopsis: Raúl is hospitalized after a car accident. Mireya gets some shocking news. Barón and Manuel are implicated in the investigation into Raúl.
episodes.title: Episode 23

episodes.synopsis: Belky aims to earn a scholarship by studying with Santiago. Tatiana offers to have Alzate recover at her house. Manuel is interrogated about Raúl.
episodes.title: Episode 24

episodes.synopsis: Raúl makes plans to escape to Ecuador while Alzate searches for him. Natalia finds nefarious ways to compete with Belky for the scholarship.
episodes.title: Episode 25

episodes.synopsis: Belky learns that professor Herminio is selling exams. Back from the U.S., Barragán meets with Barón. Raúl makes a decision about his testimony.
episodes.title: Episode 26

episodes.synopsis: Another person in Belky's life is kidnapped. Natalia confesses about what she did to Juliana on the exam. Belky learns who won the scholarship.
episodes.title: Episode 27

episodes.synopsis: Connie's relationship with Rodrigo and marriage to Alfonso come to a head. Belky learns about Manuel's disappearance. Barón takes action against Raúl.
episodes.title: Episode 28

episodes.synopsis: Manuel is implicated in a crime he didn't commit. Alfonso's attitude toward Rodrigo and Connie complicates matters at the university.
episodes.title: Episode 29

episodes.synopsis: Horacio seeks legal help for Manuel's defense. A former program associate of Belky's connects with Julio and Esteban as they try to find Yolima.
episodes.title: Episode 30

episodes.synopsis: Belky tricks Julio into believing she knows where they need to go in the jungle. Tatiana, suspicious of Belky's absence, ends up in trouble herself.
episodes.title: Episode 31

episodes.synopsis: Angela and María Luisa return to find their financial situation has changed. Alzate searches for Tatiana while she's held hostage with Yolima.
episodes.title: Episode 32

episodes.synopsis: Belky pleads with Felipe to take on Manuel's case. Meanwhile, Julio and Esteban aim to exact revenge on Manuel in jail. Belky gets a new job.
episodes.title: Episode 33

episodes.synopsis: Felipe needs Alfonso's help with his case, but he risks outing Belky's past to her new boss. Rodrigo and Connie face a challenge.
episodes.title: Episode 34

episodes.synopsis: Belky is faced with a tough decision when her past life as a guerrilla interferes with her new job. Esteban's revenge plot doesn't end as expected.
episodes.title: Episode 35

episodes.synopsis: Belky comes clean to Alfonso about her violent past, as well as her relationship with Manuel. Chucho has a business proposition for Miguel.
episodes.title: Episode 36

episodes.synopsis: Felipe, Pablo and Vanessa investigate Manuel's involvement in Raúl's murder. Alfonso tells Belky to be honest with Juliana about her former life.
episodes.title: Episode 37

episodes.synopsis: An intoxicated Alfonso reveals too much about Juliana and Rodrigo's past indiscretions. Connie finds out why her apartment rental fell through.
episodes.title: Episode 38

episodes.synopsis: Belky pays an emotional visit to Manuel while he's imprisoned. A new patient's medical problems hit uncomfortably close to home for Santiago.
episodes.title: Episode 39

episodes.synopsis: María Inés is hospitalized with health problems. María Luisa visits the university in search of Belky. Connie rethinks her relationship with Rodrigo.
episodes.title: Episode 40

episodes.synopsis: María Luisa continues to insist that she and Belky can be close friends. But when they meet up, she unknowingly puts Belky in harm's way.
episodes.title: Episode 41

episodes.synopsis: Manuel's defense hits a bump in the road when evidence that could sink his case is introduced in court. Belky tries to help María Luisa.
episodes.title: Episode 42

episodes.synopsis: Barragán discovers that his daughter is receiving counseling from a university therapist. Manuel's lawyers continue to search for Raúl's body.
episodes.title: Episode 43

episodes.synopsis: Barragán searches for Horacio to speak about the therapy sessions. He is incensed when he discovers his wife played a role and lashes out in anger.
episodes.title: Episode 44

episodes.synopsis: Belky and Juliana's friendship is put to the test when Alfonso tells his daughter the truth about Belky's guerrilla-fighting past.
episodes.title: Episode 45

episodes.synopsis: Juliana tells Santiago about Belky's past, and he hatches a devious plan. Victor seeks out Barragán's wife to ask her to testify against her husband.
episodes.title: Episode 46

episodes.synopsis: Barón has an important decision to make. Santiago continues to mount his campaign to kick Belky out of the university.
episodes.title: Episode 47

episodes.synopsis: Manuel reconnects with Belky. They move to take their relationship to the next level, but first she must overcome her past trauma.
episodes.title: Episode 48

episodes.synopsis: The parents of a group of students sign a petition calling for Alfonso's resignation and Belky's expulsion from the university.
episodes.title: Episode 49

episodes.synopsis: A soldier who lost his leg shares his story at the university, prompting many students to rethink their position on the war.
episodes.title: Episode 50

episodes.synopsis: Manuel is disturbed by Yolima's plans for the future. A new dean at the university causes conflict between Rodrigo and Connie.
episodes.title: Episode 51

episodes.synopsis: Manuel plans a special romantic date night that he and Belky can enjoy together.
episodes.title: Episode 52

episodes.synopsis: Manuel's big plans for his living situation are thwarted. Alfonso and the new dean, Bárbara, get to know each other better.
episodes.title: Episode 53

episodes.synopsis: Manuel asks Yolima not to move away and leave him alone with their daughter. Belky steps in to help with the situation.
episodes.title: Episode 54

episodes.synopsis: Alfonso gives Rodrigo a job opportunity, but Rodrigo isn't thrilled about having to work with Belky. Manuel makes a new friend at school.
episodes.title: Episode 55

episodes.synopsis: Alfonso and Belky examine an unknown woman's dead body and are surprised when they finally discover her identity.
episodes.title: Episode 56

episodes.synopsis: A surprising legal decision about Barragán affects everyone the former colonel victimized, including his wife.
episodes.title: Episode 57

episodes.synopsis: Barragán confronts Angela at their house and demands to see María Luisa. He also seeks out Felipe to threaten him.
episodes.title: Episode 58

episodes.synopsis: The group comes together to mourn Gilma at her funeral. Barragán sends someone to tamper with the brakes of a car, putting multiple lives at risk.
episodes.title: Episode 59

episodes.synopsis: Barragán continues to obsess over finding his daughter and goes to Belky's house searching for answers about where María Luisa is hiding.
episodes.title: Episode 60

episodes.synopsis: Belky is increasingly concerned about her family's safety. She heads to María Luisa's secret location to tell her about her father's atrocities.
episodes.title: Episode 61

episodes.synopsis: Shocked and upset by the new revelations about her father, María Luisa decides to confront Barragán about his actions.
episodes.title: Episode 62

episodes.synopsis: Barragán is hospitalized and doctors must perform a delicate surgery in an attempt to save his life. María Luisa waits anxiously to hear the outcome.
episodes.title: Episode 63

episodes.synopsis: Barragán asks Angela for a favor, but it ends up backfiring. Col. Alzate visits Barragán to tell him just how bad his new situation is.
episodes.title: Episode 64

episodes.synopsis: Belky's family prepares for the baby's baptism. Mireya worries that Manuel's new friend will threaten the happiness of his relationship with Belky.
episodes.title: Episode 65

episodes.synopsis: Chucho interferes with the baptism celebrations. Mireya asks Belky for forgiveness, and they talk about Belky's childhood.
episodes.title: Episode 66

episodes.synopsis: A natural disaster threatens the lives of Victor's parents while they are en route to the farm. Juliana joins Victor in the search for his family.
episodes.title: Episode 67

episodes.synopsis: Manuel's plan to surprise Belky with a vacation goes awry, and he questions the strength of their relationship as a result.
episodes.title: Episode 68

episodes.synopsis: Belky's extensive knowledge of the abortions that occurred during guerrilla warfare puts her risk when it angers one of the doctors in her group.
episodes.title: Episode 69

episodes.synopsis: Segura and Abellaneda enlist help in their plot to kill Belky without anybody knowing the motive behind the murder.
episodes.title: Episode 70

episodes.synopsis: Rodrigo, Horacio and Belky initiate their elaborate plan to save Peter's life, but it involves lying to his family about his health.
episodes.title: Episode 71

episodes.synopsis: Manuel thinks that Belky's priorities may be too different from his own, and he talks to her father about the state of their relationship.
episodes.title: Episode 72

episodes.synopsis: Melissa plans a romantic, child-free night for her and Manuel and takes the opportunity to confess her intimate feelings for him.
episodes.title: Episode 73

episodes.synopsis: The mercury poisoning Belky has unknowingly endured starts to take its toll on her health, and Silvia urges her to seek a diagnosis.
episodes.title: Episode 74

episodes.synopsis: Tatiana and Col. Alzate make plans to get married and ask Belky and Manuel to participate in the special ceremony.
episodes.title: Episode 75

episodes.synopsis: Belky's health deteriorates drastically, and Manuel rushes her to the hospital as her condition becomes grave.
episodes.title: Episode 76

episodes.synopsis: Herminio tries to interfere with Belky's medical test results so the doctors can't discover the real reason she is so ill.
episodes.title: Episode 77

episodes.synopsis: Belky's medical tests show that she's had mercury in her system for a long time, and the doctors begin to look into who has been poisoning her.
episodes.title: Episode 78

episodes.synopsis: Natalia helps Manuel figure out necessary information about Herminio, and a confrontation ensues.
episodes.title: Episode 79

episodes.synopsis: Alfonso and Bárbara are prepared to present their respective projects at the university, but one of them has a surprise in store.
episodes.title: Episode 80

episodes.synopsis: Fearing that he'll be captured, Herminio gets desperate and kidnaps someone in an attempt to escape.
episodes.title: Episode 81

episodes.synopsis: The doctors are on the lookout for Segura as she tries to discreetly gather more information about Belky.
episodes.title: Episode 82

episodes.synopsis: Segura confesses the real motive she has for trying to harm Belky and her family.
episodes.title: Episode 83

episodes.synopsis: Belky formulates a plan to confront Segura in a public place where Belky will feel protected.
episodes.title: Episode 84

episodes.synopsis: Manuel's mother travels to Bogotá to reunite with her son. She tells him the real story behind his paramilitary recruitment.
episodes.title: Episode 85

episodes.synopsis: Belky decides to share her story in a documentary about her life. She also makes a romantic promise to Manuel about their future.
episodes.title: Episode 86
